mapper.sql: select id, logistic_account_id, logistic_group_id, service_type, bl_no, booking_no, ope_code, tax_code, group_name, address, container_amount, edo_flg, specific_cont_flg, cont_supply_status, reference_no, status, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from shipment
mapper.insert:
select seq_shipment.nextval as id from DUAL
insert into shipment
logistic_account_id, logistic_group_id, service_type, bl_no, booking_no, ope_code, tax_code, group_name, address, container_amount, edo_flg, specific_cont_flg, cont_supply_status, reference_no, status, remark, create_by, create_time
#{logisticAccountId}, #{logisticGroupId}, #{serviceType}, #{blNo}, #{bookingNo}, #{opeCode}, #{taxCode}, #{groupName}, #{address}, #{containerAmount}, #{edoFlg}, #{specificContFlg}, #{contSupplyStatus}, #{referenceNo}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate
mapper.delete:
delete from shipment where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select s.*, l.group_name as logistic_name, sh.vsl_nm as vsl_nm, sh.voy_no as voy_no from shipment s left join logistic_group l on s.logistic_group_id = l.id left join shipment_detail sh on s.id = sh.shipment_id
sh.shipment_id is not null and s.id = #{id} and service_type = #{serviceType} and s.create_time >= #{fromDate} and s.create_time <= #{toDate} and (upper(s.bl_no) like concat(concat('%', #{blNo}), '%') or upper(s.booking_no) like concat(concat('%', #{bookingNo}), '%') or upper(sh.vsl_nm) like concat(concat('%', #{vslNm}), '%') or upper(sh.voy_no) like concat(concat('%', #{voyNo}), '%') or upper(s.tax_code) like concat(concat('%', #{taxCode}), '%'))
GROUP BY sh.shipment_id
